name: Guess the button!
description:
My first little game made with Python and Ursina,

the goal of the game is to buy out everything in the shop, you do so by pressing the right button to gain points. But if you press the wrong button, you lose points.

The number of points gained or lost is equal to the number on the button, the possible numbers are 1, 2, 3, 6, and 12. however, with upgrades from the shop, you can increase the value and decrease the number of lost points.

It may not seem that exciting at first, but trust me, you will be busy longer than intended.

showboat image by Harshlight: https://www.flickr.com/photos/harshlight/4242431367
